title: ðŸ”’ Unjustifiably Banned (Please Read)

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

replies.body:
This post hasn't been active in 2 years and is no longer relevant, but since there has been some recent necro posting on it I'm going to lock the thread now so that it isn't unfairly pushing down relevant discussions on the Recent list.

If you have questions or concerns about this action please visit us in the [Moderation Discord here.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)

https://i.gyazo.com/60dae3aaeeb6bf71919cf40fc9e2213e.gif

I honestly think the automated system, and or Riot doesn't understand what the term Intentional Feeding means, I have seen a lot of others who have some bad games on their Match History, but even getting 5-10 matches in a row where you do bad doesn't really qualify as intentional feeding.

The problem is some players have bad games, other players get matched and forced into roles with players who have no idea what they are doing such as myself I was unlucky enough to get matched in many games where players wanted me to bot, everyone pretty much auto locking, so I played the role, said I was going to play defensive, and instead all players do is go offensive in the games, and the toxicity I just had to mute everyone and try playing.

The problem however I did bad in the games resulting in quite a few games in a couple of days where I gave too many kills, honestly my match history is worse than yours, and you got a 14 day ban, I got an immediate perm ban with no warning still waiting on ticket to be reviewed simply for having the worst couple days of match-making and very bad game-play.

**I agree that the new system for Intentional feeding, and banning players has flaws, and honestly looking at your match history as a player you did better than me and you still get a 14 day ban.**

Like I have played League for 3-4 years, I have been somewhat toxic in the past, not extremely hateful like some of what people see I do my best to reform myself, but there is absolutely no way I would just run down lanes, afk, and intentionally give kills to the enemy we have our bad days, I would personally not risk a 3-4 year old account myself just to feed some games, and get banned after spending lots of Real Life time put into a game which I enjoy playing minus the toxicity.

So yes I agree there is something wrong with the current system for Intentional Feeding, and honestly even when a player I am playing with besides myself feeds or does bad, I hear players screaming at me to report them at the end even though they just did bad and no way is it intentional.

. In General since everyone was supposed to get a clean slate with the new 2.5 patch, I have not even got a chat restriction, or reform card either.

. Also in the past before 2.5 I have done just as bad given some games just as bad as my current history, and always improved, never got suspended for Intentionally feeding before and 3-4 years of playing league like come on, if I wanted to Intentionally feed I would just go make a dozen more accounts right now and Intentionally feed.

> I got an immediate perm ban with no warning

I doubt that.

Lets look at the facts here
1: 0-26 duo bot lane
2: off Meta picks 
3: Both Plat players and one of them is a Diamond player who's recently dropped off
4: 0 wards placed(even for Bronze players this bad, for Diamond/Plat this is absurd bot lane ESPECIALLY when split pushing)
5: 1.7K DMG as full AD - AP bot lane duo, 20 min game



- - - -



Everything they did this game was intentional and should by every mean and right be considered intentional feeding. This wasn't just a bad game, if he was Bronze 4 and did this, sure but they are Plat/Diamond players.

The biggest indicator is the 1.7K Dmg as Master Yi and Xin. Two hyper Dmg when built with Guinsoo, it's pretty obvious to anyone of any rank that in 20mins doing such little Dmg means you aren't even attacking the opponent. Not to escape, not for any reason. 

I am incredibly pleased that Riot banned these two, and I find it hilariously ironic that if most of you people had a duo bot who just afk splitpush and refused to attack you would of reported these players too, ESPECIALLY in high elo where it's very clear what they are doing is not going to win the game. 

However such is League of Hypocrites, all social justice warriors until it happens to them.

This. 
If I was investigating his claim, I would go back and see if he was boosted into Plat as well. 
There is no way to justify 12 deaths in lane. You die 5 times even and you learn to stay away. 
No one forced them to pick melee champs against an ADC. That isn't off meta at all. That is troll meta. 

Placing zero wards and doing that little damage to champions is another huge indicator of what him and his duo were up to.
0-26 is absolutely unjustifiable. 

I am also glad they were banned and I hope it increases to a month or more or even perma if they continue on like this.

I am not going to say anything else that you said is wrong, I agree with you, but one thing, there is no such thing as a troll meta. I am going to stay clear of an argument about that 0 kill and 26 deaths. One thing I want to state is that this is a normal game, ruining a normal game is much much better than ruining a ranked game, although 0 and 26 is a bit too insane even for my charts. master yi adc and xin zhao bot lane is completely normal, even for season 6. If master yi somehow (just somehow, don't ask how) gets fed, he can still dominate. When you say no one forced them to pick melee champs against an ADC, first, that is blind pick, and also, a really great youtuber, Solwolf played master yi adc not long ago. In your charts, wouldn't he be banned as well? Just keep in mind next time! :) And please don't make another argument, I hate that.

I concede my point about Yi being a troll pick if I accept your premise that magically Yi can get ahead and then snowball; sure. 
In a meta where ADCs just became super buffed? Probably highly unlikely so there is still this which would make me hesitate on saying this wasn't a troll case. 
On its own, an ADC Yi can be disregarded but coupled with the rest of the facts, it strengthens the case he was likely trolling. 
Your point of Yi being played in ADC position on its own w/o the rest of the facts is valid in that if that was the only factor in him being called a troll, I would agree it is not troll at all.
Thanks for replying respectfully.
Inb4 Rioter comes in and Rekt's OP.
Are you malicious metal's premade? :P
No. I haven't played ranked since Season 3.

Looked at this match provided, and here's what I see:
1.) You placed 0 wards. You have a free fucking trinket with TWO charges of a free ward and you didn't even use one of them. You were so focused on suiciding into the enemy team that you did not care for vision or for avoiding enemy team ganks by using your trinket. You just barreled down the lane and died.

2.) In support of my last statement in point 1, 10 of your 13 deaths were all in your lane, while 1 death was in your base on the nexus towers, which can easily be explained by dying into the enemy's final push for the game victory. So you have only 12 legitimate deaths, but 10 were in the same lane. You didn't die to any team fights in the river or jungle, just in a lane. Wtf man?

3.) The majority of the destroyed towers being in your lane doesnt help your case. 10 deaths in your lane, 0 wards placed, and you spent all of your time pushing towers? Your death placement testifies to the fact that you didn't participated in team fights (also only 1 kill assist), you only pushed towers, and you didn't ward while split pushing for those towers. 

0/10, would report you if I had you in that game. You didn't accidentally decide to play the way you did that game. You deserve the ban.

0 wards was probably because it was a rather stressful game, and unlike most others i had played. Could barely be in lane without dying, my first worry was not to ward in fear of the jungler or mid if he decided to roam. Ezreal has a good gap closer, and got fed + ranged champ + levels on us, he had more kills than I had deaths, plus rageblade if that says anything. I fed, obviously, but dont get that mixed up with "intentionally feeding"

And majority of the towers? Nah man, we are the only lane that got a tower, all other lanes had outer turrets at full hp.
if you're pushing thats when you want to ward. especially when you're split pushing.

The OP and his duo friend died once per minute. That's the amount of time it takes to get back to lane. 
So it means u were running into them intentionally every single time you got back to lane. There's no way this was just a bad game.

The system is tuned such that instances of false positives are close to zero. In cases where summoners are banned for "intentionally feeding", it's often there's supplemental evidence in either the champion select (yes, Riot has access to those chats) or in-game. If you'd like Riot to double-check that this isn't an anomaly, I'd advise you submit a ticket.
Was it just one game?
No the game before it he was a 0/8/1 malphite. And his overall score is bad

I'll explain how the system thought you were intentionally feeding:

1: Your KDA. Obviously it was pretty terrible, I don't really have to explain that. 
2: No wards placed. I know it's hard to place wards when you're so far behind, but just dropping them in bushes behind you to prevent flanks shouldn't be that tough.
3: Those tower kills can be summed up to "splitpushing" while your team was getting destroyed on the other side of the map, giving the enemies a free tower. So basically you're trading a possible chance to get something for your base. 
4: You played off-meta. Playing something like Support Yi (I know it was some sort of split between you and Xin, but the machine would probably see all Runic users as Morde or supports). 
5: AP Runes. 
6: When losing, instead of going full tank, you went for more damage and a requirement of spending more time in the middle of a team. 
7: If your AP was meant to help your healing, you had less overall healing throughout the game than anyone not in the mid lane. That's kinda sad when you built some AP on a champion who already had good healing. 

Not saying I agree with the system, just saying that that game looks very suspicious.
Check match history, look at game before, forgot to switch off of the runes I had used that game.

> [{quoted}](name=TheElitePeyt,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nQ1ZEpia,comment-id=00190000,timestamp=2015-11-22T17:44:35.349+0000)
>
> Check match history, look at game before, forgot to switch off of the runes I had used that game.

You had different  runes from your previous malphite game and your master yi game. please.

> [{quoted}](name=BakedLotion,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nQ1ZEpia,comment-id=001900000000,timestamp=2015-11-22T19:00:07.477+0000)
>
> You had different  runes from your previous malphite game and your master yi game. please.

Uhhhhh, check my previous game, it was zac, where I had that AP rune page on. I then proceded to go into my next game (the one linked above), and by default it keeps on the same rune page you used last game. So yeah, I forgot to switch to my attack speed rune page. I don't know what your point was here.

> [{quoted}](name=TheElitePeyt,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nQ1ZEpia,comment-id=0019000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-22T19:05:26.808+0000)
>
> Uhhhhh, check my previous game, it was zac, where I had that AP rune page on. I then proceded to go into my next game (the one linked above), and by default it keeps on the same rune page you used last game. So yeah, I forgot to switch to my attack speed rune page. I don't know what your point was here.

It clearly says Malphite. There's no fucking Zac game. 
http://i65.tinypic.com/mb6529.png

And even then your death locations are awfully clear. You always  die near their tower, which proves you were just running at them.
There wasnt a single death in the river. Not a single one. That means you never bothered to leave your lane to help, and only occasionally went down mid lane through your base to die.

> [{quoted}](name=BakedLotion,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nQ1ZEpia,comment-id=00190000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-22T19:30:26.340+0000)
>
> It clearly says Malphite. There's no fucking Zac game. 
> http://i65.tinypic.com/mb6529.png

I don't know why it's not showing up, but check a few other match history websites such as: 

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/38990349#matches

Hopefully you can see there that I did in fact play zac before this game.

> [{quoted}](name=TheElitePeyt,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nQ1ZEpia,comment-id=001900000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-22T19:37:30.106+0000)
>
> I don't know why it's not showing up, but check a few other match history websites such as: 

League's Match History page will only show Ranked games for players who are not on your friends list. Since both this game and your prior one were Normals, they won't show up.
Better keep on fighting the enemy when I have 0 items and being 0-8 because i'll definitely win that fight. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I'll be entirely honest, I've seen people get worse scores and not get banned, usually the way riot detects intentional feeding has more to do with, first, in-game toxicity, we'll have to check the chat logs to see if what you say is true instead of you basically saying "HAHA, RIOT CAN'T BAN ME, I'LL FEED THE BOTLANE HAHAHA". Second, how many intentional feeding games have you had, you have this ranked solo game with a 0/8/2 Malph supp and not a single ward, so that's a thing too, specially if it was ranked and you were admitting to feeding in that game as well.

To be fair, I've seen WAY too many people get away with intentionally feeding to believe the system is strict enough to ban you for a single troll-game.
I like the Crying Rageblade Yi cross. I r8 8/8 m8.
The hell this is normals???? I Mean sure every game you play you go 0/13 but for a couple games? What the fuck riot.

Well. I think one troll / intentional feed game should be enough for a ban. Why let people do this once in a while without punishment? The real question is whether this was a bad game or an intentional feed / troll game. That cannot be decided by looking at KDA.
This is normals pal just because someone calls you a noob does not mean you go cry to mommy (riot) or in this case just because you skipped class once does not mean you get suspended (banned)

Still, if it's a proven case of intentional feeding, just one game should be enough to warrant a ban. If you intentionally decide to ruin the game for other people on your team, even if it's just one time, it should be met with severe disciplinary action.

Note that I said 'proven case', I'm not going to judge the OP specifically since I can't say with 100% certainty if it's a bad game or intentional feeding, but lots of signs point at the latter.

I don't think it's so much the KDA as the deaths per minute. If you die once a minute then its going to look like your either feeding or your having a stroke in your chair that makes you walk into the enemy/towers upon respawn. Im betting it wasn't a stroke.

I'm going to come right out and say it: I don't believe you.

13 deaths in 19 minutes is highly suspicious, but that isn't why I say that. I say it because the feeder detection system was over 14 months in development. It looks at far more than KDA or wards placed. It also looks at **how** you play. It knows how and when you use abilities. It knows how often you clicked and it knows how this contrasts with your normal style of play.

My best guess is that you and your friend were screwing around. You started with an off-meta comp and decided to say "screw it" when it didn't work out the way you hoped. I dunno, 0-28 between the two of you sounds like you were trolling from the get-go, but I'm trying to give you the benefit of the doubt. 

I'm doing my best to get a Red in here to take a look. That's going to be a lot more common now with the new board than it was with the TBI forum. In the meantime, I suggest that you wait for Support to get back to you.

I can't fault the system, it probably noted a few things. One, you were playing Yi bot, which is highly unusual. Two, despite being at the Platinum level, you did not learn from your mistakes and continued to seek interaction with Ezreal in bot lane. Three, you were only able to deal a paltry amount of damage far below what the average Bronze Yi does. 

So you have someone who dies an obscene amount of times in high level play, with a very unusual champion/lane combination, with far below average damage to players. Add to that a complete disregard for warding and it looks like you had no intention of playing towards a win.

"Hold up! It was Normals, why should I tryhard in Normals?"
Because "it's Normals" is not an excuse to ruin the game for your team mates.

Whether you were intentionally feeding is hard to tell, but all signs point toward more than just "a bad game". It looks like you took part in unhealthy decision-making a lot as well.
Post the notification of the ban. That way we know you're not lying about it only being one game.

for failing to use a ward for preventative measure, you deserve whatever gets thrown at you.

vision and map awareness are key components to this game and being negligent towards those elements leads to failure.

only people you'll outplay are bots with that attitude...and even the beginner bots will ward.

you brought fists, sticks & knives to a gunfight...what did you expect to happen?

Actually bots haven't warded in months, they just buy them and fill teir inventory with them.
Yes, even after the removal.
Also when you keep dying you don't necessarily have the time and place to war between each respawn and death.

I wonder why you didn't place any wards. However from your kill death map in relation to building kills you where in the right place. If the tribunal was still up I would not resolve you but likely skip. I just wouldn't be sure either way.

It is a flaw in my gameplay that I do need to work on, doesn't mean I was trolling because I didn't place a ward though. There was really no need for wards in the situation i was in, I was mostly sitting under my turret getting zoned by a double ranged bot lane, waiting for the wave to come, but I usually dont do that well with warding if you check a few other matches.

Its hard to tell. We only have your word. I have been around a long time on these forums. Usually people like you complain and moan about being banned and give a very biased view of the situation with the intent of getting community support but once Riot makes a post they usually provide the whole picture and it is clear that the person deserved the ban. Now I am not saying this is the case with you because some people have been falsely banned (druiddroid). However, I am not willing to take your word for it until such a point where the whole picture is revealed. If you were falsely banned; best of luck to you.
I hope rito comes and rekts OP.

No, no, served out your 14 day ban and realize that. THIS IS A TEAM game, when you refuse to group, do 1.7K DMG to champions. That's roughly using your Q combo ONCE in a 20min game, and try to troll people with your teammate who also went 0-12, that's when you deserve to get rekt. 

You may think you aren't intentionally feeding and ruining the experience with everyone else, but if you want to play a game where you just ignore your teammates and just split push and feed the whole game then League isn't for you. 


I support Riot 100% in this one, there's too many people in League that do this passive aggresive type of feeding. I've seen it in ranked, "Oh guys i'm helping i'm split pushing I refuse to group" "here' i'm trying they can't ban me i'll attack once every 5 mins"


No, I don't care what you say, there is no excuse for 1.7K dmg to champions in a 20mins game, even if their entire team came to kill you. You can do more than 1.7 DMG JUST BY Q'ing ON THEM to get away instead of just standing still and dying.

You intentionally fed this game, and so did your teammate. The only thing I would change is that he gets banned too

You made your bed, now lie in it

>You may think you aren't intentionally feeding 

If you don't think you are intentionally feeding... then you're not... you're just feeding. It can only be intentional if you are INTENTIONALLY feeding, you can't be if you think you aren't.
And feeding is non-punishable.

He's a plat player who placed, zero wards, did 1.7K dmg to champions in 20mins as Master yi and him and his duo went a combined 0-24. Love how everyone is a social justice warrior and so easily deceived when if you had this kid and his duo in game you would know he's clearly intentionally feeding.

Yeah because duos are always trolls right? You needa look at the big picture, im a glass carry, 6 levels behind the enemy (4 at least from other lanes), every lane lost so what do I do? It was pretty much a lost cause with a teemo top and our comp whole they had a fed diana, ezreal, etc. (tanks usually go top)

You did not lose b/c of a Teemo top. You lost b/c of a Mastery Yi and Xin bot lane. 
I'm not sure if you understand it or not but off-meta does not mean pick melee champs into bot lanes and see how hard you can feed. Ezreal got fed off of you and despite him being fed, 12 deaths in lane are not excusable at all.

If Riot uses an automated system to determine that someone is intentionally feeding, I question that logic.  Using an automated system for foul language works.  But if I were to go by the OP's information, I'd have to say that an automated system's judgment, in this case, is the wrong way to go.

I'd say this needs reviewed.  Send in a support ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Samus72,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nQ1ZEpia,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-22T07:07:41.219+0000)
>
> If Riot uses an automated system to determine that someone is intentionally feeding, I question that logic.  Using an automated system for foul language works.  But if I were to go by the OP's information, I'd have to say that an automated system's judgment, in this case, is the wrong way to go.

They added in the automated system for intentional feeding rather recently, but they made it to only catch on extreme cases for the time being. Him going 0/13/1 wouldn't get him banned, it's probably due to him having scores like that over multiple games AND getting reported multiple times in each of these games.
On the screen where they showed the games where I had committed the offences, it only linked the game I provided above. None of my other matches have been that dramatic recently anyways.
The previous game was a 0/8 Malphite support in a ranked game. Those two games together, especially with the very low damage to champions in both, look pretty suspicious.

You had AP runes and masteries. And both you and your friend Xin died an insane number of times along with only 1 assist and 0 kills. Looks like intent feeding to me lmfao. You also started E as a laner. And you're gold or silver (idk which just looking from your forum badges)

You're trolling for fucking sure. Stop trying to hide it.
